name: carcinogenic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
causing cancer, or relating to things that cause cancer: Residents believe the furnace emitted carcinogenic gases for 25 years. The possible carcinogenic effects of overcooking meat and eggs are well documented. carcinogenic pesticides
More examplesFewer examplesResearch has shown that many of these preservatives are carcinogenic.Sarin is carcinogenic and can damage the central nervous system in sufficient doses.It is believed that cannabis is between two and four times as carcinogenic as tobacco.
